title: Local Docker runs but see nothing

content.raw:
I worked through getting local docker and the nvidia docker installed. Both were successful with the "hello world" and nvidia output. 

I built S Peters test image from github. 

Then run the docker script linked to on the srcsim docker wiki page. 

It runs but I see nothing after the 'docker run...' line. (I added -x to the script to see what was going on.)

Docker is an unknown to me. Since this is running nvidia should I see a window? Should I be able to connect with rostopic? If so what IP addresses? 

I see in the script that the master ip is 192.168.2.1:11311 but the ros_ip is 192.168.2.10. Should the base ips be the same?
